word: THE DISCUSSIONS WERE AT TIMES HEATED. SOME, FEARING THAT THE NEW EMPHASIS WOULD WEAKEN THE CHURCH'S STRONG POSITION ON GOD'S LAW, PARTICULARLY THE SABBATH TRUTH, STRONGLY RESISTED THE MESSAGE ON RIGHTEOUSNESS BY FAITH. NO CONFERENCE ACTIONS WERE TAKEN ON THIS POINT OR ANY OTHER POINT BROUGHT FORWARD IN THE BIBLE STUDIES.
